 \FACTS ABOUT ME/
-Age- 13
-Favorite Game- Oh god, 1. Probably AOE2, then Hearthstone, then Civilization 4/5.  After that, probably Spore. Minecraft probably isn't in my top 10. But I've beaten every other game.
-Favorite genre of game- I really like strategy-type things. In games and stuff i always play the thing that's the most fun. (In TF2- i only play Spy XD)
-Sports i play- I currently play Tennis and i like to swim. I used to play basketball, but it got annoying.
-Favorite subject- i like EVERYTHING. Except English.
-Favorite animal- i love owls.  (O.O)
-Favorite Part of minecraft- Um, the cows?
-I mostly go on the forums since i don't have the time for Minecraft.
-I like pokemon.
